name: UL TS BV
goal: UL TS (Transaction Security) guides companies within the mobile, payments, transit, industrial control and automotive domains through the complex world of electronic transactions and cybersecurity. UL is the global leader in safeguarding security, compliance and global interoperability. Offering advice, test and certification services, security evaluations and test tools during the full life cycle of your product development process or the implementation of new technologies. ULâ€™s people pro-actively collaborate with industry players to define robust standards and policies. Bringing global expertise to your local needs. UL has accreditations from industry bodies including Visa, MasterCard, Discover, JCB, American Express, EMVCo, UnionPay International, PCI, GCF, GlobalPlatform, NFC Forum and many others.
interests: Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Information Society, Research and Technology, Transport
